Perfect! âœ… All features have been successfully implemented. Here's a complete summary of what was added to your AI Accountant application:

## ğŸ‰ Implementation Complete!

### âœ… New Features Added:

#### 1. **Receipt Photo Upload ("Ğ¡Ğ½ÑĞ» Ğ¸ Ğ¿Ğ¾ÑˆĞµĞ»")** ğŸ“¸
- Added camera/file upload button in TransactionsView
- Simulates OCR data extraction from receipt photos
- Auto-fills transaction form with extracted data (amount, category, date, description)
- Mobile-friendly with camera capture support

#### 2. **Professional Invoices** ğŸ“„
- New **InvoicesView** component with full invoice generation
- Create invoices with multiple line items
- Automatic tax calculations (customizable tax rate)
- Displays subtotal, tax amount, and total
- Generation time tracking (shows "generated in X seconds")
- Invoice management table with status tracking (draft/sent/paid/overdue)
- PDF download and email sending functionality (ready for backend integration)

#### 3. **Accounts Payable/Receivable Tracking** ğŸ’°
- Added to DashboardView with two dedicated cards:
  - **Accounts Payable**: Bills you need to pay with due dates
  - **Accounts Receivable**: Money owed to you from clients
- Real-time totals displayed in badges
- Status indicators for each item
- Visual distinction with color-coded amounts (red for payable, green for receivable)

#### 4. **Built-in Currency Converter** ğŸŒ
- New **CurrencyConverter** component added to Settings
- Supports 10 popular currencies (USD, EUR, GBP, RUB, JPY, CNY, CHF, CAD, AUD, INR)
- Real-time exchange rate calculations
- Quick amount buttons (100, 500, 1000, 5000, 10000)
- Swap currencies feature
- Exchange rate information display
- Refresh rates button

#### 5. **Metamask Integration** ğŸ¦Š
- New **MetamaskButton** component for crypto payments
- Auto-detects MetaMask installation
- Wallet connection functionality
- ETH payment processing (converts USD to ETH)
- Transaction hash tracking
- Integrated into PricingPaywall under "Wallets" tab
- Falls back to "Install MetaMask" if not detected

#### 6. **New Invoices Tab** ğŸ“Š
- Added dedicated tab in main navigation (8 tabs total now)
- Accessible from main app interface
- Fully translated for English and Russian

#### 7. **Full Bilingual Support** ğŸŒ
- Updated English translations with "Invoices" tab
- Updated Russian translations with "Ğ¡Ñ‡ĞµÑ‚Ğ°-Ñ„Ğ°ĞºÑ‚ÑƒÑ€Ñ‹" tab
- All existing translations preserved
